post.description: Register a new account with email and password.
Login with email and password, returns JWT token. Automatically binds device to account.
Bind current device (UUID) to the logged-in account.

get.description: Get account information including all bound devices and accumulated privileges.

delete.description: Unbind a device from the account.

get.description: Get detailed account information (username, avatar, extra_info).

put.description: Update account detail information (username, avatar, extra_info).

post.description: Upload avatar image. Requires JWT authentication. Automatically updates account detail.
Batch add game log entries. Requires JWT authentication. Duplicates are automatically skipped.

get.description: Query game logs for the authenticated account.
Get sync information for game logs (latest log time, total count, oldest log time).
